Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface GameModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game, ProxyGameModel
public interface GameModel
This interface is composed by all the game methods that the controller can call

  • Method Summary

    • addPlayer

      boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, int age, int indexClient)
      This method adds the player and sets all the information
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      age - player age
      indexClient - client index of the player
      Returns:
      false if the player is not added because has a similar name with another player, otherwise returns true

      This method counts how many players has been added

      boolean canMove()

      Returns:
      true if a worker can move, otherwise returns false

      Returns:
      true if is reachable

    • movePlayer

      boolean movePlayer​(int indexWorker, int row, int column)
      This method moves a worker from a box to another
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that the player moves
      row - row of the box where the player wants to reach
      column - column of the box where the player wants to reach
      Returns:
      false if the player can do another move, otherwise returns true

    • canBuild

      boolean canBuild​(int indexWorker)
      This method checks if the worker can build
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that has to build
      Returns:
      true if the worker can build, otherwise returns false

      indexWorker - worker index that has to build
      Returns:
      true if is reachable

    • buildBlock

      boolean buildBlock​(int indexWorker, int row, int column)
      This method builds a block in a box
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that builds
      row - row of the box where the player wants to build
      column - column of the box where the player wants to build
      Returns:
      false if the player can do another move, otherwise returns true

    • setIndexPossibleBlock

      void setIndexPossibleBlock​(int indexPossibleBlock)
      This method sets the index of the possible block that the player wants to build
      Parameters:
      indexPossibleBlock - possible block index

    • checkWin

      boolean checkWin​(int rowStart, int columnStart, int indexWorker)
      This method checks if a player won
      Parameters:
      rowStart - row of the starting box
      columnStart - column of the starting box
      indexWorker - worker index that the players moved
      Returns:
      true if the players won, otherwise returns false

    • checkWinAfterBuild

      boolean checkWinAfterBuild()
      This method checks if someone could win if there are complete towers on the board
      Returns:
      true if a player won, otherwise returns false

    • getWinner

      int getWinner()
      Winner getter
      Returns:
      integer of the winner

    • controlHeartBeat

      void controlHeartBeat​(int indexClient)
      This method resets the heartbeat counter if it receives a response from the client
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who sends the heartbeat response

    • incrementHeartBeat

      boolean incrementHeartBeat​(int indexPlayer)
      This method counts how many heartbeats a client misses
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - player index who sends the heartbeat response
      Returns:
      true if the client misses the maximum number of heartbeats that could miss, otherwise returns false

    • reset

      void reset()
      This method resets all the class so if a game ends, the players can start a new game
